title: Spacious 1 bedroom apartment 56m2 + balcony + parking + storage
body:
QR Code Link to This Post


Spacious one bedroom apartment in the 18th arrondissement. 
Total space 56m2.
A living room + a bedroom, fully equipped kitchen (dish washer, stove, oven, refrigerator, extractor hood), shower, separate WC and a washing machine.
Lots of cupboards.
Large windows.
Lots of light.
BALCONY
PRIVATE PARKING
STORAGE 
3rd floor with an elevator.
1540 euros per month including building charges and water.

Real-estate agency fee to be paid on top of the rent (one time fee).

To schedule a visit, please contact us via WhatsApp on +33663087837 or send us an email.
